attachments.text: I’m using Arpack.jl to get the lowest few eigenvalues of relatively large N x N matrices. To achive this, I’m first cal sparse(row, col, data) to get the matrix to the appropriate form. Although the matrices I’m working on are large, N should be representable with UInt32, i.e., smaller than 2^32, so this is what I’m using as the type of row and col to save some memory.
